lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I think that the Kiva model is win-win, can't lose.  The lender dollars do good, come back, and go out to do good again.  Powerful!
lenders.occupational_info: I help single adults find loving partners using Internet dating sites.

lenders.name: Shaun Lindbergh
lenders.loan_because: Because I can! I think  Kiva is a magic way for ordinary people like me to make a difference on a global level. Just awesome!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business activist who  is passionate about inspiring and empowering people to achieve their dreams. I have been involved with various forms of social development since the late 1970's.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: It's all I can do, given my resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in using our software products.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help people who are less fortunate and many of these entrepreneurs depend on our micro loans to subsist.

lenders.name: ADAM
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it feels good to be able to give someone across the world an opportunity to be more successful in their life. I also really like the flowing cyclical nature of the lending where the money comes back and I can re-lend it so I get to make loans over and over with the same money. It's great to be able to make a large impact based on such a small contribution.

lenders.name: Ian Samuel
lenders.loan_because: The boy immediately picked up a starfish and threw it back into the ocean. And then he did the same for the next nearest starfish, and the next nearest after that; continuing until he had tossed almost all of the starfish in his vicinity back into the water.  The father admonished the boy that he could not possibly save all of the starfish on the beach.  The boy tossed one more starfish back into the sea, turned to his father and said simply, “maybe not, but it saved that one.”

lenders.name: Danny Sauter
lenders.occupation: College Student. President of EDUN LIVE On Campus.
lenders.loan_because: each loan is a step to empower individuals and communities around the world. and that, is awesome.

lenders.name: frye
lenders.loan_because: slots, free casino slots, free slots
lenders.occupational_info: The thing is that if you try this you will never want to try something else because free slots are the best!

lenders.name: BulkReefSupply.com
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it very easy to make a meaningful difference in the world. Plus, it’s a loan so our initial investment can continually benefit other people once the loans are repaid. Kiva is also the most transparent charity we have found and the only charity we know of where you can revolutionize someone’s life or even a whole community with a $25 loan and then once it is paid back help a whole new series of people with the same money or even withdraw the entire loan without it ever costing you a dime.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell affordable salt water aquarium supplies to reefers who appreciate quality, value and solid customer service.

lenders.name: Minou
lenders.loan_because: It is everyone's responsibility to care, give and share
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur at heart - involved in financial literacy/education for children & youth - www.mindtreasures.com

lenders.name: Mark

lenders.occupational_info: We run a small family owned and operated sign and sports graphics company in Independence, Missouri, USA

lenders.name: Lauralee

lenders.occupational_info: I lived for 6 years in a 3rd world country and got a new attitude after moving back to US and seeing how spoiled we North Americans are!

lenders.occupational_info: I keep development in line with government regulations.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because:
My favorite quote is -- "do what you can, with what you have, where you are."   That philosophy led me to Kiva.

Growing up in a working class family, I know first-hand the roadblocks for the working poor.  I also know how much a helping hand can mean at a critical moment.    

I can't afford to make huge donations nor am I in a position to volunteer on a full-time basis.  But through organizations like Kiva, I am trying to "do what I can, with what I have, where I am."

lenders.loan_because: I hate usury / loan sharks.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computers answer questions.

lenders.occupation: Nurse Entrepreneur Network Director and coach
lenders.loan_because: I know how blassed I am to have options and resources. There are entrepreneurs in other countries that could do some much and gain independence if they only had a small amount of help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have a subscription website that help nurses start and grow their own businesses. As a nurse myself I learned that I could be in control of my work life and enhance the amount I could earn by becoming a nurse entrepreneur. I wanted to be dependent on myself and not on a health care organization to determine my future. I have a website and a blog to help other nurses so they don't have to figure it out all on their own. 

I also have a website and blog for cabin owners and those dreaming about being cabin owners.

lenders.loan_because: This is a new and fun way to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work logistic issues for the U.S military.

lenders.loan_because: Want to start a small/medium scale dairy cattle farm
lenders.occupational_info: Starting in 2002 I began growing sweet peppers organically. i enjoy working in the field that's why the field produces quality product. yet, market price in my locality is low making no profit after every  harvest. So I am planning to borrow for an additional capital for my shifting to dairy farming.

lenders.name: Peanut - the Kiva dog!

lenders.occupational_info: No day is the same!  I'm a really good at sleeping, eating snacks, barking at strangers, licking strangers, growling when I don't want you to move me from my owner's lap, and oh did I mention eating snacks?  I saved up quite a few snack bones to make this contribution, so please consider doing the same!  Please consider donating money to my site so that I can provide more opportunities to people in need.   Chow now...

lenders.occupational_info:
Owner/CEO John Ramirez

 

 

Many elements can make food a pleasurable discovery rather than simply something to eat. At Angels Catering, we dedicate ourselves to produce the highest quality and most innovative items for your event. Not only are we providing our clients with delicious food but a creative expression that will heighten the joy of your guests.

Precise and exceptional. These are words that come as second nature to our dedicated staff. Our staff takes great pride in the individual effort of providing service that brings a worry free smile to you.

Our goal at Angels catering is simple,

 
To provide unparalleled service to our customers, community, and service industry with high standards for our quality food. We pay diligent attention to every detail and always provide an immaculate environment. Our goal is to continue to raise the standards for excellence each and every day in the catering business. Excellent Food, Excellent Service, Excellent Value! Angels catering strives to bring you a quality presentation of tantalizing food at a reasonable price. Select from our wide array of menu items or add some of your own. We are willing to work with you so you get exactly what you want.

Various Catering Styles
Dinners Luncheons Breakfasts Picnics Barbeques Buffets
Banquets Formal Dinners Children's Parties

Delicious Catered Cuisine
Spanish, Mediterranean, American and Southern Cuisine with a Creole Flair
Individual Menu Planning Platters Hors d Oeuvres
Healthy Vegetarian Dishes

Any Special Occasion
Weddings Showers Anniversaries
Fundraisers Promotional Events
Class Reunions Corporate Parties Funerals Grand Openings
Business Outings Business Meetings / Seminars Theme Parties
Cocktail Parties

Special Services
Wedding Consultants

Location: On or Off-site Catering
Will Travel (Call for Details)
Fashion Shows
Delivered to Your Office
In Your Home

 

We are known for our outstanding food and menu creations.  All menu items are prepared to order and made from the freshest ingredients.  This is a family run business and our repertoire of well-tried recipes are an accumulation of generational  contributions.  


Service and Staffing is another aspect of our full service catering company.  We take a great deal of pride in being able to provide our customers with the most professional and courteous selection of servers, bartenders, and delivery people. Displaying and serving of food is very important to us.  We are continually updating our complete line of buffet equipment to insure that our customers have the best presentation available. We have a menu for every budget! Please call us for any further information.

( References are always available )

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Responsibly administered microcredit improves both individual lives and the world as a whole.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the co-founder of XE.com, the world's most popular currency and foreign exchange website.

lenders.name: Shankar
lenders.loan_because: equal opportunity is a myth
lenders.occupational_info: hospital doctor in the making

lenders.name: Preston
lenders.loan_because: Because we're not a people who fear the future, we're a people who make it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make sure people's computers continue to work all day.

lenders.name: Rance
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed, and want to bless others.  In my travels, I have come to believe that outright aid creates dependency.  The Kiva model helps people help themselves out of poverty.  If I loan to 10 people, and 2 don't repay...so what?  I've helped 8 people RADICALLY change their life!  Keeping money in the system is incredible....when someone pays you back, re-lend it to someone else in need.  I love seeing people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Husband, father, and friend who dabbles in the financial services field.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: In helping others, we help ourselves.  Microfinance is a way of engaging in sustainable philanthropy and social responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in fundraising for a university and help raise money for scholarships, faculty and building campaigns.

lenders.name: WLC Kiva Project
lenders.loan_because: The Walter L Cohen HS Kiva Project is a student based philanthropy group.  The students are required to conduct research on individual Kiva Entrepreneurs and then develop a persuasive presentation for the class.  The students then act as a committee evaluating the different presentations before choosing one to provide funding for.
lenders.occupational_info: The purpose of this project is to promote the real world application of economic and geographic knowledge as well as communication, business, and team work skills.

lenders.name: Sirpa
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way to help someone in person.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help as I have been helped
lenders.occupational_info: Having suffered the pains of PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME and seeing first hand the incredible destruction is causes in the lives of all involved,, I pray for my chlidren and the children of others who have experienced and are experiencing what should be considered one of the greatest crimes against humanity, the evil act of one parent taking away the right of a child to love both their parents, sometimes the illness of the offending parent is just too great and the ALIENATION can steal away the entire childhood years from the other parent, it is my dream and goal to end PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME as soon as possible for each family,, We use the Internet daily it is a very powerful medium,, we must use it for GOOD for the BETTERMENT of our kind the Human Race,,so it's with that heart,,I use the proceeds from my business to further my life's passion which is creating a forum where Parents and Children who are seperated because of PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME can find one another and never be seperated again.... To spread the word of the exisitence of such a program that the whole world will use it and one day put an end to the hideous machine that is the FAMILY COURT SYSTEM, through love and support and a sense of doing what is right,, we can prevent children from ever being separated from both their parents :) or sadly we can atleast reunite adult children with their other parent before its too late and PARENTAL ALIENATION SYNDROME strikes its final blow, which is the parent and child never get back together again,, please help me get the word out, to breathe life into  FATHERS LOST AND FOUND, I have used every dime of my money and my business is now suffering as a result of PAS and my efforts to combat it,, Thank you for your time and now if nothing else you too know about the crime of PAS please pass along the website even if you can't lend  "We should teach Children how to love not who to love"  myspace.com/fatherslostandfound

Nancy is also currently working on teaching-learning applications related to Second Life (SL), Social Networking (Facebook), and Mobile Computing (iPhone, iPod Touch, Kindle, Nook, iPad), and the D2L CMS.

lenders.occupational_info: I try my best to help people struggling with mental illness, or difficulty in their lives of any kind.  I use psychotherapy, psychoanalysis, and medications when they're helpful.

lenders.occupational_info: I am interning at Kiva.org this summer of '09

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I live in Australia and we have so much so it is nice to help out others.  Plus I have seen this is sustainable lending, and know how much the impact of one loan through Kiva can have on so many people when it is repaid and relent.

lenders.name: Omar
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of investing money on a small-scale, interpersonal level.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on water resource system and equipment projects for the Department of Water Resources in California, U.S.A.

lenders.name: Abigail
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students about the different cultures and also teach students to write. My students' writings about their dreams and hopes have always made me want to do more. Kiva allows me to do just that.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the importance of community and supporting that community.

lenders.name: Piti
lenders.loan_because: Nothing is better than giving other people opportunity to stand on their own feet at the cost of virtually nothing.

lenders.name: terry
lenders.loan_because: helping someone in need gives joy to my heart knowing I can make a difference and touch another persons life. we all need help one way or another. THANKS KIVA FOR THIS OPPORTUNITY!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: i work with the public, so everyday i see people needing all kinds of help and i take that as a chance to make a difference in that persons life. now that i have taken on a new endeavor with my artist, life has become challenging for me. A MOTHER OF EIGHT!!!

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I like to help responsible and hardworking people.
lenders.occupational_info: Scheduling tests and doctor's appointments for patients with lung diseases and breathing problems. Also, lots of reading.

lenders.loan_because: It is always important to help!!

lenders.loan_because: bring a little help to far away country
lenders.occupational_info: help people bring some harmony into their lives

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: We have so much and with such a small amount of money we can be a tremendous help to people who really need it.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I believe in better opportunities for all.

lenders.occupation: Co owner Rude Boy & Rude Girl Apparel

lenders.occupational_info: I do office work (not very exciting), and I love bagpipes and golf.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student.

lenders.name: Lena
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus Christ and want to share the gifts he's given me. I live out my faith by giving to the poor, widows, orphans.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people stay healthy. When they get sick, I help doctors take care of them.

lenders.name: Elke
lenders.loan_because: if I can help, why wouldn't I?

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I love people!  I am thankful for everything I've been given in life and I feel like I have been tremendously blessed, especially with the best friends and loved ones a person could hope for.  Proverbs 19:17
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a former educator in search of a new calling.....

Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
- the 14th Dalai Lama
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to leave the world a better place than we found it.

lenders.loan_because: I believe there are much better things to do with my money than I've been spending it on so far :)
lenders.occupational_info: I develop web sites...

lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I make interactive maps.

lenders.name: Laurel

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: I feel a strong desire to help those less fortunate than me in my own community and also at the global level.
lenders.occupational_info: I make the indoor climates comfortable for people by adjusting and fixing ventilation systems, either through heating or cooling.

lenders.occupational_info: Im  a freelance computer technician saving  every available dollar

lenders.occupational_info: Enable people to achieve

lenders.name: Heli
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women, and especially women with children, so they can set an example for their children.

lenders.name: Angelika
lenders.loan_because: This is the best my money can do, while I am not using it.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: it helps people.
lenders.occupational_info: manage businesses.

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.loan_because:
I'm an entrepreneur who built a successful business with my wife Karen.  We admire people who are self-driven and make things happen independently. We have a scholarship called "the Beaupre Entrepreneurial scholarship" to encourage self-motivated students. Our business is also involved in social responsibility.

I love reading the stories of entrepreneurs on Kiva and want to encourage them. Never give up and always believe in yourself!  Every human being can help change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We help organizations discover, create and implement an authentic social responsibility "giving back" culture that makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I want to give hardworking people a chance to better their lives and the lives of their children
lenders.occupational_info: Taking care of elderly and sick people.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women to support themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Woman Helping Women

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: to help other people.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I love knowing that such a small amount of money can make a huge impact to someone

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I think micro loans are the surest way to support the arts around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fiber artist making art dolls.  I also used to weave until arthritis stopped me.
